content.full_text:
W. & C. Fellowes & Company to Logan & Lincoln, 11 April 1849 This will be handed you by our agent MrThomas Speedwho visits Springfield upon our business. You will oblige us by giving to Mr Speed

any aid in your power in the adjustment of our business in your Vacinity,1
paragraphs: W. & C. Fellowes & Company to Logan & Lincoln, 11 April 1849 This will be handed you by our agent MrThomas Speedwho visits Springfield upon our business. You will oblige us by giving to Mr Speed
any aid in your power in the adjustment of our business in your Vacinity,1
